name: CalLaFountainLanguageWave
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Some say it's a spiritual self-help meditation or a fireside story poem snack, others say it's the greatest joke since your Aunt Donald and Uncle Ariana's selfie. One time someone kind-of-cute claimed these sounds as a crucial piece of their mental health fitness routine. 

Positivity and optimism dance inside the party of your laugh and I extend an invite requiring no RSVP. It could be a motivational mantra or a comforting inner music. A city ritual. A refreshing plant. Some friendly words. Makeshift art, food, science, and philosophy. Finding a cure for the Novel 2019 coronavirus. It could even be like soft gentle rain and an ambient synthesizer combined to craft the ultimate soundscape and you're cozy in style wearing matching vintage sweaters with your favorite puppy before warm social mysteries of the most lit variety.

Media would have you believe in something far more rotten than your own ability to alter, transform, and improve this temporary Earth experience. Cal LaFountain Language Wave offers some kind of reminder.
